    • Method Detail

      • fromLine

        public static Z4TracerPath fromLine​(double x1,
                                    double y1,
                                    double x2,
                                    double y2,
                                    double surplus,
                                    double step)
        Creates a Z4TracerPath from a line
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-axis coordinate of the start point
        y1 - The y-axis coordinate of the start point
        x2 - The x-axis coordinate of the end point
        y2 - The y-axis coordinate of the end point
        surplus - The surplus from a previous path
        step - The step
        Returns:
        The Z4TracerPath

      • fromQuadAndLine

        public static Z4TracerPath fromQuadAndLine​(double x1,
                                           double y1,
                                           double ctrlx,
                                           double ctrly,
                                           double x2,
                                           double y2,
                                           double x3,
                                           double y3,
                                           double surplus,
                                           double step)
        Creates a Z4TracerPath from a quadric Bezier curve followed by a line
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-axis coordinate of the start point of the curve
        y1 - The y-axis coordinate of the start point of the curve
        ctrlx - The x-axis coordinate of the control point of the curve
        ctrly - The y-axis coordinate of the control point of the curve
        x2 - The x-axis coordinate of the end point of the curve (the start point of the line)
        y2 - The y-axis coordinate of the end point of the curve (the start point of the line)
        x3 - The x-axis coordinate of the end point of the line
        y3 - The y-axis coordinate of the end point of the line
        surplus - The surplus from a previous path
        step - The step
        Returns:
        The Z4TracerPath

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Checks if this path has more points
        Returns:
        true if this path has more points, false otherwise

      • next

        public Z4Vector next()
        Returns the next tangent vector
        Returns:
        The next tangent vector, null if the path has no more points

        public Z4TracerPath restart()
        Restarts the path
        Returns:
        This Z4TracerPath
